document_title: Colloid goiter: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
The main cause is insufficient iodine in the diet, which often occurs in some iodine-deficient geographical areas (far from coastal areas). In an area where goiter is endemic, more than 10% of children aged 6 - 12 years old are affected.
In addition, the cause of the disease also comes from other disorders in the body, using drugs, eating a lot of foods containing goitrogens (such as cassava, cabbage, chayote, ...).
subsection_title: buou giap keo.json. Cause of thyroid colloid goiter
